messages.content: I want to thank the local doctors and consultants who have been outspoken in supporting me. I have repeatedly mobilised the local population to defeat attempts to close key parts of Bassetlaw Hospital and the success of the massive local campaign to re-open the children’s ward overnight will depend on this election.
I am not a party puppet, I put the people of Bassetlaw first

keyPolicies.policyDescription: This autumn there will be key decisions to determine the future of house building in this area for the next 20 years.
I fought a hard campaign with the support of local people to keep the fire station in Retford. We need to maintain full-time crew permanently.
Organised 'Bassetlaw Day' in Parliament to showcase things made, grown and sold in the area.

issues.health: I want to thank the local doctors and consultants who have been outspoken in supporting me. I have repeatedly mobilised the local population to defeat attempts to close key parts of Bassetlaw Hospital and the success of the massive local campaign to re-open the children’s ward overnight will depend on this election.

community.content: This decision has huge consequences for all of Retford. I will be backing proposals that restrict urban sprawl in Retford and instead have worked closely with landowners to bring forward proposals for new villages to meet our housing needs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Organised Veterans Event, Bassetlaw Day in Parliament

endorsements.endorsement: Having worked as a local GP, I know that the NHS in our area is under threat. John is the only candidate with the experience and drive to defend our local NHS services.

quotes.text: Save Bassetlaw Children’s Ward Campaign hits back at Conservative’s ‘scaremongering’ claims

examples: They are also requiring Bassetlaw to build 6000 new homes over the next 20 years.
I am not a party puppet, I put the people of Bassetlaw first
Having worked as a local GP, I know that the NHS in our area is under threat.
I fought a hard campaign with the support of local people to keep the fire station in Retford.
This decision has huge consequences for all of Retford.
Plans in place to remember the event and encourage visitors to come to the area... Mayflower pilgrims which regard as the origins of democracy and the American constitution.
Save Bassetlaw Children’s Ward Campaign hits back at Conservative’s ‘scaremongering’ claims.

nonPolicyAttributes.family: I come from a family with a big military tradition.

examples: I always put Bassetlaw first - ahead of party loyalty and my political career.
